entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who has a plan and is talking to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is weak from his struggle with Voldemort and is being talked to by Dumbledore.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who tried to kill Harry when he was a baby.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is talking to Harry in the hospital wing.
Voldemort is mentioned as an opponent of Dumbledore's plan.
Harry was a victim of Voldemort's attempt to kill him when he was a baby.
